Detailed Description

Author:
Group 20:
  • Pradyumna Kumar
  • Jayanth Tadinada
  • Sharjeel Imam

DESCRIPTION

This file defines various functions for Firebird V movement, interrupts, motor speed and pin configurations

LCD Connections: LCD Microcontroller Pins RS --> PC0 RW --> PC1 EN --> PC2 DB7 --> PC7 DB6 --> PC6 DB5 --> PC5 DB4 --> PC4

Note: 1. Make sure that in the configuration options following settings are done for proper operation of the code

Microcontroller: atmega2560 Frequency: 11059200 Optimization: -O0 (For more information read section: Selecting proper optimization options below figure 4.22 in the hardware manual)

2. Buzzer is connected to PC3. Hence to operate buzzer without interfearing with the LCD, buzzer should be turned on or off only using buzzer function

Function Documentation

void lcd_cursor ( char  row,
char  column 
)

Takes the cuser to row,column.

Parameters:
row- row number
column- column number
void lcd_home (  )

Bring cursor to 1,1

void lcd_init (  )

Initialize the LCD screen so that we can write to it. Call this function only once.

void lcd_line1 (  )
void lcd_line2 (  )
void lcd_port_config ( void   )

Initialize the LCD ports. This functions need to be called only once and before calling any other LCD related function. This function is called through port_init() and not directly.

void lcd_print ( char  row,
char  coloumn,
unsigned int  value,
int  digits 
)

Given a value print it upto certain characters. For example lcd_print(0,0,1000,1); will print 1 on the LCD screen.

Parameters:
row- Row number
coloumn- column number where cursor is to be moved
value- value to be printed on the screen.
digits- number of digits in the value to be printed.
void lcd_reset (  )
void lcd_set_4bit (  )

Will reset the LCD screen and set it to work in 4bit mode.

void lcd_string ( char *  str )
Parameters:
str- a pointer to a string to be printed on the lcd screen.
void lcd_wr_char ( char  letter )
Parameters:
letter- Write a single character to LCD screen.
void lcd_wr_command ( unsigned char  cmd )
Parameters:
cmd- send a character command to LCD.
